extendedInfo.description: Need to keep your screen ON for reading, testing your apps, or anything else? Wakey will keep your screen awake for you, when you need it the most!With the AutoWake feature you can choose what apps should automatically keep your phone awakePREMIUM FEATURES:The premium features are:âAutoWake: Automatically awake when an app from the list is in the foregroundâCPU Wake: keeps CPU running while the screen is off (WARNING: it will drain battery), useful for downloading big games from the play store and files from the web (otherwise they'll stop);âKeep device awake when chargingâBrightness controllersâAllow screen to dim when awakeâPersonalize the bulb light colorPreventing your screen from sleeping, useful for a lot of thing, like:âGamingâViewing mapsâPlaying IngressâUsing your phone/tablet as digital photoframeâShowing photos to your friends and familyâReading an ebookâReading the newsâChecking your emailâTesting applicationsâIn car usageâFollowing a recipe when you're cookingâShowing a desk clockand many more.Wakey is memory and battery friendly, it will keep the screen awake only when you need it, when you don't need it anymore just tap the bulb, or turn it off from the notification.You can enable and disable it even quicker from the widgetWARNING!: Wakey might misbehave with task killersIf you experience problems please email me ;)Permission requirements description:ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE : for adsGET_TASKS : for AutoWake to check what app is running in the foregroundINTERNET : for adsWAKE_LOCK : to keep the screen awakeWRITE_SETTINGS: to save settingsBILLING : for premium feature purchaseRECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED: Turn on AutoWake notification after system restart if AutoWake is enabled

reviews.title: Problem Solved and Sooo Simple!
reviews.comment: All my husband and I ever wanted was to have the screen display stay on during a call placed on speaker phone and try to use the keypad without it going dark and then having to hit the on button a dozen times to keep the display on.  None of the factory settings we changed would help.  We both have Samsung Galaxy 2.  This app did just what we wanted.  Turn on or sign into your phone, hit the light bulb icon and the screen display stays on.  Hit light bulb icon again and shut off Wakey or leave alone and manually shut screen off and keep Wakey on for future use.  This app just made life a little less frustrating.
reviews.author: Karen Malmgren

reviews.title: Great app to have
reviews.comment: Works fine and do what it says. App that should come with manufacture OS. great work developers. Keep it up   PS: for ppl who referred my previous review. Problem was with my phone/cache, After restarting the phone app worked fine and still working fine.
reviews.author: Jayanath karunarathna

reviews.title: Kept rebooting my Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Was trying to use it with the Seagate Media Center.  After installing, the 7 would restart after about two minutes.  It might be a conflict between the two but I can\'t use it
reviews.author: Brad Harris

reviews.title: Note 2 Self: This works!
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried the two different \"Stay Awakes\" and a widget and nothing works like this.  No dimming while charging and \"At Bat\" stays on while I\'m driving.  I couldn\'t ask for anything more.  Great job!
reviews.author: Rick Petersen

reviews.title: Help a lot!
reviews.comment: Bought it after tested the free version for a while. Useful for Maps & Ingress :)
reviews.author: Amril Hadri Jamaludin

reviews.title: It is, what it say
reviews.comment: Pretty good app
reviews.author: Rene Rivera

reviews.title: Great app, great support
reviews.comment: Free version does what it says and is worth 5 stars alone. However adding the premium features was well worth it. Allows you to really customize screen timeout settings. Dev also responded asap to a question.
reviews.author: Michael Steinberg

reviews.title: Easy tool for setting screen to stay bright
reviews.comment: 03AUG2013.  Wakey, great for keeping your screen on longer than the default setting when doing something that requires the screen to remain on with no user interaction.  Press it again and the screen reverts to its former settings.
reviews.author: Craig Knapp

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.comment: The developer is very responsive. App does what it says.
reviews.author: Michael Gerbasio

reviews.title: Does what is says...
reviews.comment: And does it well.  I\'ve been using it with my HTC One and it is brilliant at keeping certain apps awake (Car, Ingress), and then going back to regular sleep mode when I exit them.  Perfect.
reviews.author: John Zuur Platten

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Everything I wanted from this app
reviews.author: Connor B

reviews.title: Sharp 104sh
reviews.comment: An amazing free app that does what you want.  I use this on my phone when playing games like Final Fantasy 4 which always dims the screen and on my tablet\'s music player which I use in the car.   Fantastic app that works 100% the way you want it to.
reviews.author: Yakumo Yakumo

reviews.title: Does exactly what you expect
reviews.comment: Not only it keeps the screen awake, but it keeps my phone from locking (work email security policy forces phone to lock within 5 minutes). New Droid Maxx
reviews.author: Marcelo R

reviews.comment: Awesome
reviews.author: lakshay sharma

reviews.comment: I don\'t need notification
reviews.author: roger alien

reviews.comment: No comment
reviews.author: Shafiq Nazrin

reviews.title: Did not work for me
reviews.comment: Seemed to work at first, but my screen is now dimming again. If I have to keep restarting it, that kind of defeats the purpose. I have no task killers. Nexus 4. - I have no idea how to email you. Your address does not appear anywhere. Re-installed and messed with settings...same result.
reviews.author: Jeff Pruett

reviews.title: excellent 5 stars
reviews.comment: Works great don\'t consumption battery at all and my screen stays on thanks Dev!!!!
reviews.author: Chanel Haggins

reviews.title: Absolutely Love It (Just One Request)
reviews.comment: This app works flawlessly, fixing a thing that has bothered me about Android forever.  My one request is that the AutoWake icon not always be present in my menubar, it is a tad annoying and messes up the live notifications Google added with Jellybean. Could there be an option to turn AutoWake on without a persistent menubard icon?  Keep up the fantastic work!
reviews.author: Jonathan Miller

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: I purchased the premium app for the ability to have a list of apps that wakey automatically works with so I wouldn\'t have to manually turn it on all the time and now the icon isn\'t in my status bar, it\'s way better
reviews.author: Morgan T.
